title: Restore and enhance health-check command with repo sync capability
description: Restore the health-check command from .archive/examples/development-project/.claude/commands/health-check.md and enhance it with GitHub repository comparison functionality. The enhanced command should be able to compare a local project's .claude/ structure against this template repository to identify drift and missing updates. This requires the version tracking system (Task 2) and sync manifest (Task 3) to be in place first.
notes: Blocked until version tracking (Task 2) and sync manifest (Task 3) are complete. Will need breakdown once unblocked due to difficulty 7. Key enhancement: compare local .claude/ against erikemilsson/claude_code_environment repo via GitHub API or local clone.

assumptions.description: Archived health-check.md provides a solid foundation to build upon
GitHub API or gh CLI can be used for repo comparison without authentication issues
assumptions.validation_method: Test gh CLI access to public repo
